content: As discussed during today's container meeting, let's created a docker directory in the root, remove the fake Dockerfile, and write more in the README. And any other ideas, of course. Here's the issue (feel free to edit or comment): #10157
I thought I mentioned this somewhere but seem mistaken: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/compare/develop...poikilotherm:dataverse:10157-dockerdir
Some small stuff I played with for a little while
